addAdmin(address).details: Admin adds another address as an admin

params._address: must be the address of user to be stated as admin

addAdmin(address).return: admin the address tied to the admin is true or false

addProduct(string,uint256,uint256).details: Shop Owners can add a product to their store

params._availability: will determine the amount of items in stock
params._price: will be the price for the product
params._productName: will be the name of the product

addProduct(string,uint256,uint256).return: name Name of the productprice The price of the productavailability The Amount of items in stock

addStore(string).return: name of the store This function is a payable function and msg.value will be used for funds to be  attributed to the store. msg.sender will also be used to map the address of the function caller to the store.

params._address: must be the address of the user to be stated as store owner

addStoreOwner(address).return: bool the _address parameter is associated with a store

changeProductPrice(uint256).details: Shop Owners can change the price of a product

params._newPrice: is to be the price for the product associated with msg.sender

changeProductPrice(uint256).return: newPrice of the product tied to msg.sender

identifyUser(address).details: To verify the type of user

isAdmin(address).details: To vefirify if address is admin

params._address: the addres to be verified as admin

isStoreOwner(address).details: To verify if an address is a storeOwner

params._address: the address to be verified as store owner

purchaseProduct(address,uint256).details: Shoppers can choose an item to purchase

params._amount: is the amount of items to be purchased
params._ownerAddress: is the address of the product owner

purchaseProduct(address,uint256).return: caller the address who purchased the productname of the productamount of items purchased Function is marked as payable Funds are given to the store of the associated ethereum address. msg.sender is debited ether using the transfer() function. product availability is reduced by the amount of items purchased

removeProduct().details: Shop Owners can delete an item from their store

withdraw(uint256).details: Shop Owners can withdraw an amount of ether owed to them

params.amount: is the desired amount to be withdrawn

withdraw(uint256).return: funds of the store tied to the address of the function caller
